data.message: I love both Em & Bey but this song is horrible! I couldn't even bare to listen to the whole thing. Too soft, too plain, too nothing and Beyonce's whiny chorus, ugh, nails on a chalkboard. Sorry guys.

replies.message: I lasted 36 seconds.
I had so much hope :(
u're old af :) or just suffering from disease called " Trump "
GTFO I hate trump, I just know good music vs bad dumbass.

:) lmAo I don't see any of the things true in the above statement u're one of those jetks who judged without listening to the words the situation & its first track from the album u sit here talk shit on the other hand he still ruling
Dude, get a life, I can have an opinion you fucking moron! Boy Bye!
nobody asked for ur opinion u go back to ur closet
troll
This song has a strong message.  It's obvious you didn't listen to the lyrics

Pamela Shelton Hello!! can you read, of course it’s obvious, in my original comment I said "I couldn't even bare to listen to the whole thing." I couldn't get past the terrible whiny chorus. You think you’re so clever pointing out what I️ already said lmao. Seriously though, get over it sheesh.
Brittany Ann i dont even think i lasted that long lol  so bad
Mandy your right shit soong fuck it
Why yes, Mandy Penn, I can read. I can also spell. I read that you couldn't "bare" (Correction: bear) to listen to the whole thing, I replied that it was OBVIOUS.
Pamela Shelton get a life, go fight for a real cause. k thanks.
Pamela go fuck Tommy on a yacht again
I wouldnt say bad i mean, art is always relative but its just not one i could get in to.

You know what an idiot is? Someone who gives there opinion on something they didn't take the time to fully comprehend. Oh look, that defines you, the person who didn't listen to the whole song yet still criticized it...well done👏
Dylan Fourie lol maybe if it was a better song my ears could stand to listen to it in its entirety. Sorry my opinion hurts you so bad.
This song sucks to be honest and I'm the biggest stan I know. And why the fuck did he choose Beyonce?! She fucking sucks.
I think someone is trolling in here, either that or they stumbled into the comments of an artist they didn't like in the first place!

People can have opinions, it’s ok. A person can like or love an artist but dislike a song, it’s ok people. Doesn’t mean we aren’t fans, just means we say what we feel (kinda like Em does), we don’t just agree because we think it’s gonna score points with the artist or because if we don’t we “aren’t real fans” you guys need to get a life!

Lifelong Eminem fan
Here since he dropped slim shady lp, and I’m insanely disappointed by this track
Zac Kohler thank you, same here!

Honestly I’ve been a huge fan for almost 20 years straight and this is one of his worse songs he’s put out ever. I’m hoping the record is better than this cause if not it might be the first Eminem record that I won’t buy
Zac Kohler yep, agree 💯!
